constituent: remorse, Freud, state of mind, emotion, march, mouth, heart
heisigStory: State of mind . . . emotion. Hint: the etymology of "remorse" indicates a memory that returns again and again to "bite at" one's conscience and disturb one's peace of mind.
koohiiStory1: Remorse is the state of mind where I feel bad for what I did while I was tired and emotional!
koohiiStory2: Tip: If you are confusing this keyword, remorse, with repent (#625) and regret/resentment (#1460), then note that rEMOrse contains EMOtion.
myStory: hối tiếc. xin lỗi. tâm trạng tình cảm
